actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase from $1,000,000 to $10,000,000 the exemption from industrial development bond treatment for certain small issues.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $1,000,000 to $10,000,000 the dollar limit for bond issues qualifying as small issues, for purposes of the exclusion from gross income of the interest on such bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase from $1,000,000 to $10,000,000 the exemption from industrial development bond treatment for certain small issues.
